content: Yes, there are several rooftop bars with spectacular views in Hong Kong. One of the best rooftop bars with a stunning view of the Victoria Harbour is OZONE located on the 118th floor of the Ritz-Carlton Hotel in West Kowloon. The bar has an outdoor terrace that offers breathtaking panoramic views of the city skyline and the harbour. Other rooftop bars that are worth checking out include Sevva, Wooloomooloo, and Cé La Vi, all of which offer amazing views and great drinks.
